docs.title: Lunaar
docs.text: Lunaar is an open-source web proxy and online gaming platform designed for speed, privacy, and fun—all in your browser.

docs.title: 🚀 Features
docs.text:
• Modern UI: Clean, responsive, and easy to use.
  • Fast Built-in Proxy: Browse securely and bypass restrictions.
  • 350+ Built-in Games: Play a huge library of games instantly.
  • Theme Support: Light, dark, and custom themes.
  • AI Chatbot: Get instant help or just chat for fun.
  • Inspect Element: Developer tools at your fingertips.
  • Tab Cloaker: Hide your activity with cloakjs.
  • Panic Key: Instantly hide Lunaar with a single keystroke.
  • And much more!

docs.title: BYOD
docs.text: You can BYOD (Bring Your Own Domain) to Lunaar

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
• Must be in the Discord server and create a ticket to activate your link (may change soon)
  • A domain (if you don't have one, you can get one here. Or get a free subdomain here)

docs.title: Steps
docs.text:
1. Point your domain to 164.152.26.189 with an A Record
  2. Join the Discord server
  3. Open a ticket

docs.title: Hosting Services
docs.text:
To deploy lunaar take a look at this repo and click one of the buttons

View Repo

docs.title: Running Locally
docs.text: You can run Lunaar locally or on a server by following these steps:

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Node.js 22
  • PNPM
  • (Optional) Groq API key for Luna AI

docs.title: Step 1.5: Install PNPM (if not already installed)
docs.text:
If you already have PNPM installed, skip to Step 2.

npm install -g pnpm@latest

docs.title: Updating Lunaar
docs.text:
To keep Lunaar up to date (highly recommended to run once a week):

cd lunaar.org
git pull
